nodes.text: This racing team was headed by Jace Rucklin, and consisted of himself, Lin Gaava and Gorrak Wiles. They operated out of the Colossus platform on Castilon. They had a reputation as being lazy pranksters who didn't focus on their work.

Early in development, each member of the team had a placeholder names: Camie, Fixer and Deak. Those were references to Camie Marstrap, Laze "Fixer" Loneozner and Deak, who appeared in a cut scene from Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope as friends to Luke Skywalker.
